Title: Enacts the "NYCHA - innovating neighborhoods through viable efficient solutions for tenants act"; appropriation
Summary: Enacts the "NYCHA - innovating neighborhoods through viable efficient solutions for tenants act" which provides funding to NYCHA to rehabilitate vacant units.
LawCode: Add ยง14-a, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT amend the public housing law, in relation to enacting the "NYCHA - innovating neighborhoods through viable efficient solutions for tenants act"; and making an appropriation therefor
